title: Ice
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 55 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: Ice forms everywhere--on houses, on roads, even on street signs! Ice explains how ice is formed and shows readers some of the places it can be found. The patterned text is supported by detailed photographs to support emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to visualize as they read and to determine cause-and-effect relationships.
reviewWords: forms, freezes, ice, slippery, water, wet
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word can, on, and when
